p: The plant Zanthoxylum armatum was collected from Salhad, district Abbottabad, KPK Pakistan in September 2018. After confirmation by taxonomist Dr. Muhammad Nazir, the specimen was placed in the herbarium of COMSATS University Islamabad, Abbottabad campus under voucher no CUHA-198. The fruit, leaves, stem bark and root bark were washed cautiously and kept for drying at 25 Â°C, ground and was made into a fine powder and was preserved in an airtight container. The powder drug was soaked with 95% methanol at room temperature, filtered and the filtrate was concentrated under vacuum and preserved for further use.
